basics.name: Jonathan Ma
basics.label: Student
basics.summary: Aloha! I'm Jonathan, currently a junior at UH Manoa majoring in computer science and I am expected to graduate at the end of fall 2022. My main interests are data science and artificial intelligence but hope to one day pursue a career as a Scala developer.

work.summary: Providing one-on-one treatment for children with autism
highlights: Collect data of students’ behaviors through direct observation.
Communicated behavioral intervention results with students’ parents and caregivers.
Taught students specific behavior skills called for in treatment plans.
Programmed and operated CNC mill machine.
Created eye-catching displays to increase brand awareness and promote new items.

work.summary: Providing one-on-one treatment for children with autism
highlights: Worked collaboratively and independently to deliver quality products for customers in a timely manner
Managed inventory for products and supervised co-workers during shifts
Reported to manager weekly regarding customer inquiries and how to improve team efficacy and social media outreach.
